title: College of Information Sciences and Computing Student Council - CSCo
details:
BAYANIHAN 2025 – 1st Session

August 11, 2025 | 8:00 AM – 12:00 PM
CISC Building

In preparation for the upcoming AACCUP Accreditation, the College of Information Sciences and Computing is calling all houses to unite for our Bayanihan Cleanup Drive!

Attendance will be checked.

Point System:
1. Points will be awarded based on attendance, cleanliness of your assigned area after the activity, and completeness of cleaning equipment brought.
2. The house with the most attendees, well-maintained cleaning area, and complete tools will earn the highest points!
3. These points will contribute to your overall house standings for future competitions and events.
4. Please bring your own cleaning equipment (broom, dustpan, mop, trash bags, etc.) — this will also be checked and counted for points.

Cleaning Assignments:
Java – Left Wing
Perl – Front & Back Areas
Python – Right Wing

Let’s work together, make our college shine, and show the Bayanihan spirit at its best!

Pubmat by: Shekinah Solon
#CISC
#CSCo
#AACCUP
#Bayanihan2025

title: College of Information Sciences and Computing Student Council - CSCo
details:
CISC College Assembly 2025

August 16, 2025 | 9:00 AM – 12:00 PM
Main Auditorium

All students are required to attend the college assembly to discuss upcoming programs, policies, and initiatives.

Agenda:
1. Welcome Remarks
2. Overview of College Activities
3. House Announcements and Recognition
4. Q&A Session

Attendance will be recorded and points will be awarded to each house for full participation.

title: College of Information Sciences and Computing Student Council - CSCo
details:
CSCo Valorant Tournament 2025

August 22, 2025 | 1:00 PM – 6:00 PM
Computer Lab 3

Join your house teams in the ultimate Valorant showdown!

Rules:
1. 5v5 matches
2. Best of 3 rounds per match
3. Fair play and sportsmanship are mandatory

Point System:
- Wins contribute to house rankings
- MVPs will earn bonus points for their house

Bring your own peripherals.

title: College of Information Sciences and Computing Student Council - CSCo
details:
CSCo Dota 2 Championship 2025

August 24, 2025 | 2:00 PM – 7:00 PM
Computer Lab 2

Teams will battle in a single-elimination Dota 2 tournament.

Rules:
1. 5v5 matches
2. Best of 1 for preliminary rounds, Best of 3 for finals
3. Players must use their assigned house accounts

Points will contribute to overall house standings.

title: College of Information Sciences and Computing Student Council - CSCo
details:
CSCo Inter-House Volleyball Tournament 2025

August 30, 2025 | 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM
CISC Gymnasium

Compete for glory in the annual house volleyball championship!

Rules:
1. Teams consist of 6 players per side
2. Round-robin preliminary matches, knockout finals
3. Sportsmanship and fair play are required

Points awarded based on match wins and performance.

title: College of Information Sciences and Computing Student Council - CSCo
details:
BAYANIHAN 2025 – 2nd Session

September 12, 2025 | 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM
CISC Building

In preparation for the upcoming 115th CMU Foundation Anniversary and Alumni Homecoming, the College of Information Sciences and Computing calls on all faculty, staff, and students to participate in a college-wide Bayanihan on September 12, 2025 (Friday), from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.

To avoid disruption of classes, students are required to render at least one (1) hour of bayanihan during their vacant periods. Attendance will be monitored closely by the Dean’s Secretary and the CISC Student Council officers.

Faculty and staff participation is highly encouraged to ensure the success of this meaningful activity.

Let’s come together and show the true spirit of Bayanihan as we prepare to celebrate our foundation and alumni homecoming!

Pubmat by: Shekinah Solon
#CISC
#CSCO
#bayanihan2025
